title: vipoligarch
author: vipoligarch
created_time: March 27, 2023, 06:34:21 PMLast edit: June 20, 2024, 04:07:12 AM by vipoligarch
content: This service allows you to get a virtual Visa card with nonKyc approach.There is still KYC for plastic cards (which needed for cash withdraw).But you can use virtual card anonymously and spend your crypto online at any merchant that accepts Visa or even offline via ApplePay or Google Pay!The service is based in Hong Kong and works since 2019.The cost of the virtual card: 200 USDTBUT if you use VIP invite code during registration, you can get this card for as low as 49 USDT!(current offer valid untill April 1st)Limits of the card:Min TopUp: 15 usdmax top up: 20000 usdmax turnover: 500000 usdcard validity: 3yrs (reiisued for free after expiration)max daily spend: 20000 usdmax spend per transaction: 20000 usdcan bind to ApplePay/GooglePay and spend offline at any POS: yescash withdrawal: not supportedKYC: not requiredFee for deposit crypto to internal acc in the app: 0% (free)Fee for Top UP the card from internal balance: floating (usually around 4.1%)1) download the app from Appstore or from Google Play, actual links leading to the app are here:https://bitfree.us2)sign up, durign registration input the VIP code in the "Invitation code" fieldThe VIP code:dh6dOyplease note that O in the code is a capital letter, not number!3) Proceed to the Deposit menu in the app and fund your account (BTC, ETH, USDT and many more cryptos are accepted)Your crypto is deposited instantly (5-30 mins depending on the coin or network you use)!4) Proceed to "Apply Cards" menu and choose "Visa Virtual"During ordering the card, input the VIP promo code in the "Coupon" field again.The price of the card will be reduced to 49 USDT.The VIP code:dh6dOyplease note that O in the code is a capital letter, not number!5) In 12 hrs, your virtual card is issued, its number, cvv and PIN code for offline transactions (via Apple Pay) will be shown in the "Card info" menu which appears in the app at the time of card issue.6) Top UP menu also appears with the card.You can deposit your crypto to the App first using Deposit menu, after that top up the card from internal crypto balance using the TopUP menu.Top UP of the card is INSTANT!Thats it!Enjoy your card, spend your crypto online or offline:)P.S. If your country is not on the list of available countries for registration, feel free to contact me in Telegram, I will try to solve this issue!https://t.me/vipvipoligarchor search @vipvipoligarch in TelegramYou can also contact me directly if you have any questions.You can also subscribe to PROMO channel that i created, so to be in touch with system's latest news, promos and discounts!https://t.me/bitfreepromoThe system has been working mostly with Asian users (Japanese, Korean etc) and now is expanding almost worldwide, so soon English chat of the users will be created in Telegram as well.

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: vipoligarch on March 27, 2023, 06:34:21 PMThe service is based in Hong Kong and works since 2019.Strange that I never heard about it and I follow most news and services related with non-kyc cards, both virtual and physical.Maybe the reason could be that you were focused more on Asian market, but reading on your website FAQ page I can clearly see you are asking for KYC verification with ID card or passport!I don't understand why calling something non-kyc when it's not  https://bitfree.us/faqQuote from: vipoligarch on March 27, 2023, 06:34:21 PMThe cost of the virtual card: 200 USDTThat is very expensive, and why using USDT for receiving payments instead of Bitcoin?I know several services that are much cheaper or they give free virtual cards without any kyc.Quote from: vipoligarch on March 27, 2023, 06:34:21 PMFee for deposit crypto to internal acc in the app: 0% (free)Fee for Top UP the card from internal balance: floating (usually around 4.1%)Fees for top up balance could be lower, or at least add lower fees for VIP users.Are you offering only virtual or there are physical cards as well??I am reading FAQ page and I see there are ATM mentioned, POS card swipe, etc.

comments.author: GxSTxV
comments.body: I'm curious, if your service has been operating since 2019, why isn't it more popular or well-known? I have tried to search for more information about your or this services online, but I find it odd that I can't find any reviews on Trustpilot especially for a financial service that has been offering Visa cards for over four years.Additionally, I find your service to be quite expensive, and I don't see any special benefits that justify the high cost of the VIP program. For instance, Pyypl offers a virtual Mastercard with much lower deposit and withdrawal fees, and it's completely free. Based on these factors I don't see anything exceptional or special  about your service that would make me want to pay $200 or even $49 while there’s much alternatives.

comments.author: Renampun
comments.body: hi OP what are you acting as here, owner or just a marketing team?This is the first time I've heard about your product and based on who is, this site is Hong Kong-based.I also see that downloading your platform on Google Pay reaches 10k++I think the reputation of your product is not very good but the concept that you offer is quite interesting in my opinion, it's just that the fee for top-up is high (around 4.1%).

comments.author: vipoligarch
comments.body: Hi guys, Im glad to answer your questions, howeever, for faster response you can get in touch with me directly in Telegram:https://t.me/vipvipoligarch"Strange that I never heard about it and I follow most news and services related with non-kyc cards, both virtual and physical.Maybe the reason could be that you were focused more on Asian market"Yes"but reading on your website FAQ page I can clearly see you are asking for KYC verification with ID card or passport!I don't understand why calling something non-kyc when it's not "KYC is needed for plastic card if you wanna withdraw cash. For POS purchases with plastic and for virtual cards, its Non-KYC"That is very expensive, and why using USDT for receiving payments instead of Bitcoin?"If you were to read the topic attentively you would see there is promo code dh6dOywhere "O" is the capital letter,use this code during registration and get the virtual card for as low as 49 USDT!You can also use BTC and more than 70 cryptocoins along with USDT for funding your card."Fees for top up balance could be lower, or at least add lower fees for VIP users."Based on the market conditions, the fees could not be lowered.4.1% is the final fee, whereas another services hide additional fees during spending from card.Bitfree doesnt have any another fees during spending, 4.1% for top up is the only fee you pay."I know several services that are much cheaper or they give free virtual cards without any kyc."You are free to use a service which fits you the best, my friend "I'm curious, if your service has been operating since 2019, why isn't it more popular or well-known? I have tried to search for more information about your or this services online, but I find it odd that I can't find any reviews on Trustpilot especially for a financial service that has been offering Visa cards for over four years."The service have been and is aimed at crypto enthusiasts from Asia, but accepts english speaking users as well.You can make sure it has been on the market since 2019 by checking reviews in the Japanese appstore which dated back in 2019:https://apps.apple.com/jp/app/bitfree/id1453815920"For instance, Pyypl offers a virtual Mastercard with much lower deposit and withdrawal fees, and it's completely free. Based on these factors I don't see anything exceptional or special  about your service that would make me want to pay $200 or even $49 while there’s much alternatives."Pyypl doesnt provide ApplePay support and their limits are 1000usd per day, meantime Bitfree offers ApplePay on Virtual Cards and up to 20000 usd per day. Pyypl is KYC, Bitfree is KYC free.Pyypl adds another 2% when paying in non-usd, when Bitfree doesnt add up any FX fee for conversion.4.1% is the final fee, whereas another services hide additional fees during spending from card.Bitfree doesnt have any another fees during spending, 4.1% for top up is the only fee you pay.Guys, pls no another services discussion in this topic!You are free to use a service whichever you like.Bitfree has its own benefits and its own customers, you are always welcomed, download the app:https://bitfree.usand register in the app using the VIP promocodedh6dOywhere "O" is the capital letter,use this code during registration and get the virtual card for as low as 49 USDT!Sometimes there are also promotions for plastic cards, pls subscribe to TG Promo channel to be in touch with latest news, promos and updates!!https://t.me/bitfreepromo

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: Quote from: vipoligarch on April 01, 2023, 06:46:08 AM4.1% is the final fee, whereas another services hide additional fees during spending from card.Bitfree doesnt have any another fees during spending, 4.1% for top up is the only fee you pay. When all the fees are added and subtracted, it comes out to about the same. Other services have lower card deposit fees but higher ATM and conversion fees, while you seem to be doing the opposite. You charge more on card deposits and apparently nothing on withdrawals. It's still worth mentioning that ATMs can apply their fees irrespective of you. In how many regions/countries and currencies have you tested your cards to confidently say there are absolutely no ATM fees at all?So it doesn't matter if I use an ATM in Asia, EU, non-EU, the Americas..., it's always with no extra fees? Are you working with interbank exchange rates or which rates are used for conversion? Do you have a source that shows the exchange rates your service uses?

comments.author: Kavelj22
comments.body: Quote from: vipoligarch on April 01, 2023, 06:46:08 AMGuys, pls no another services discussion in this topic!You are free to use a service whichever you like.It's weird!It's the first time I've seen an advertiser ask the community to stop discussing his service in this way. All the questions that were asked are legitimate and it makes no sense to publish about your project if you want to avoid discussion about it. This is a public forum!It would be good to continue the discussion with the members because this increases your credibility and helps people trust you with their money.Personally, I have not heard of your service, even though you have been on the market since 2019, and despite the fact that I consider myself a follower interested in all types of cards that can be loaded using crypto.Quote from: vipoligarch on April 01, 2023, 06:46:08 AMdownload the app:https://bitfree.usand register in the app using the VIP promocodedh6dOywhere "O" is the capital letter,use this code during registration and get the virtual card for as low as 49 USDT!The opportunity to use the promo code ends 01/04, meaning today. I mean, starting tomorrow, any subscriber must pay $200 to benefit from the service. This is very expensive and unfair because it does not make sense for this price if fees will be imposed on each activity that the user will perform..Do not expect that many people will use it, since it seems that no one has heard of the service, and I do not expect them to trust you just because you are posting here with a new account.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: If the service provider knows that you do not ask the users to verify their identity, then these cards will stop, not to mention that they accept Bitcoin, which means that the eyes around them will be greater.I do not know, but there is no legal way in which you can obtain these cards, either you buy them from the black market and therefore either with the knowledge of the owner or they are hacked or stolen, but using your personal data it is difficult to continue from the year 2019 with high demand and without being discovered.Quote from: vipoligarch on April 01, 2023, 06:46:08 AMGuys, pls no another services discussion in this topic!You are free to use a service whichever you like.It's a bad way to introduce yourself.

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: vipoligarch on April 01, 2023, 06:46:08 AMKYC is needed for plastic card if you wanna withdraw cash. For POS purchases with plastic and for virtual cards, its Non-KYCYou should clarify this on your website and show clear options for virtual and physical kyc cards, but I would prefer if there wasn't any sending of personal infromation.Just wondering what's the price of physical cards and do you ship worldwide to all countries or there are some restrictions?Quote from: vipoligarch on April 01, 2023, 06:46:08 AMGuys, pls no another services discussion in this topic!LOLYou have to be able to reply questions for similar services to compare them, and as far as I know this is not communist dictatorship forum

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: Your FAQ section seems to only focus on the physical card and not the virtual card. On the other hand, you mostly talk about the virtual card service. Explain the following to me please:QuoteDoes Card have a consumption rate?Consumption via card swipe has a rate of 1.5%. For more information on consumption, please check the instructions on spending limit on the Card page.https://bitfree.us/faqI can't say I have heard the term 'consumption rate' before. Is that the fee you charge from the amount the user transacts with?This looks interesting, especially the no KYC part. But this is a service I would personally only consider if it stays alive and remains spotless in 1-2 years from now. I am only saying that based on how similar services abruptly disappeared from this forum.

comments.author: vipoligarch
comments.body: Hi, consumprion fee applies only for plastic cards, not virtual ones.Top up of the plastic card 2.6% + consumption fee during POS purchase 1.5% = 4.1%Top up of the virtual card is 4.1% and no consumption fee.The site of the service not much informative, you can find up to date information in Telegram channel:https://t.me/bitfreepromoor directly in the app.Please dont forget to use the VIP promo code during registration, so in the future you get discounts on all types of cards.The VIP promo code:dh6dOyplease note that O in the code is a capital letter, not number!

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: vipoligarch on June 15, 2023, 05:11:41 AMThe site of the service not much informative, you can find up to date information in Telegram channel:You mean in telegram channel with whole 8 subscribers  I don't understand why it's so hard to update website with more correct details information, because I can't find anything special on telegram either.Sorry but all this looks very suspicious to me.

comments.author: joniboini
comments.body: Quote from: vipoligarch on June 15, 2023, 05:11:41 AMThe site of the service not much informative, you can find up to date information in Telegram channel:So what is the purpose of the website then? Your social media is also inactive. Checking from play store reviews I'm not really confident about your service either (some of them are from 2022, and you've yet to give a response to them as far as I can see). Your Google Play store has 10k downloads but there are no reviews, I can only say that it looks sketchy as of now.

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: Has anyone from the EU or the US tried a virtual card and has any experience with it? I assume that if the card has a 3DS it should work in the EU - but honestly I don't like that it is necessary to install an app on a smartphone - it would be good if there was an option to activate the virtual card via the web interface.I'm also wondering if USDT is the only way to pay for the card or is it possible to do it with BTC/altcoins?

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: vipoligarch on May 23, 2024, 01:20:24 AMNow you can obtain nonKYC visa virtual card for 89usdt,I can't find this card for 89usdt in bitfree app, I can see other cards and one of them is for 99usdt with 3ds support (I did input code you posted during registration).And you should really create web interface for people who want to use browsers and don't want to install and use any more apps on their phone devices.
